alt_order_id.description: Optional merchant supplied order ID.  Jet will map this ID to Jet's order_id and you can then use this ID in subsequent messages relating to this order.

shipment_id.description: Jet's unique ID for a given shipment.  This is defined by Jet.

alt_shipment_id.description: Optional merchant supplied shipment ID.  Jet will map this ID to the Jet's shipment_id and you can then use this ID in subsequent messages relating to this shipment.

shipment_tracking_number.description: Packaging tracking number that the carrier is using

response_shipment_date.description:
Date/Time that a given shipment was shipped

                    #Valid Values

                    This date should be in ISO 8601 format: yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss.fffffff-HH:MM

                    Example: 2009-06-15T13:45:30.0000000-07:00

response_shipment_method.description:
Shipping method used for the given shipment

                    #Valid Values

                    List of ShippingMethods set up by you

expected_delivery_date.description:
Date/Time that the shipment is expected to be delivered to the customer

                    #Valid Values

                    This date should be in ISO 8601 format: yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss.fffffff-HH:MM

                    Example: 2009-06-15T13:45:30.0000000-07:00

ship_from_zip_code.description: The zip code of the locations from which the customer shipment is being shipped

carrier.description:
The carrier that will complete final delivery of the shipment.   The tracking number should be for this carrier. Must be one of the valid values.

                    #Valid Values

                    * 'UPS'
                    * 'USPS'
                    * 'FedEx'
                    * 'OnTrac'
                    * 'Laser Ship'
                    * 'A1'
                    * 'Eastern Connection'
                    * 'UDS' - United Delivery Service
                    * 'UES' - United Express System
                    * 'CEVA'
                    * 'ABF'
                    * 'DHL'
                    * 'APEX'
                    * 'Pilot'
                    * 'Prestige'
                    * 'Spee Dee'
                    * 'Lone Star'
                    * 'Other' - Any carrier not listed above

carrier_pick_up_date.description: Date/Time that the carrier pick up the customer shipment from the facility where the shipment originated

shipment_item_id.description: Jet's unique identifier for an item in a shipment. This is defined by Jet

alt_shipment_item_id.description: Optional seller supplied ID for an item in a specific shipment.  If this value is specified with Jet's shipment_item_id, Jet will map the two IDs and you can then use your own shipment item ID for subsequent feeds relating to that order item.

merchant_sku.description: The merchant SKU that is in the given shipment

response_shipment_sku_quantity.description: Quantity of the given SKU that was shipped in the given shipment

response_shipment_cancel_qty.description: Quantity of the given SKU that was cancelled in the given shipment

RMA_number.description: If returned, the RMA # in your system associated with this order item

days_to_return.description: The number of days the customer has to return the shipment item

address1.description: The first address line for the return location

address2.description: The second address line for the return location

city.description: The city, town, or village of the return location

state.description: The state of the return location

zip_code.description: The postal code for the return location
